page.title: 05Daily Diary B'ham
page.content: 8.00 I woke up and went to the bathroom and had a wash. I cleaned my teeth and went back to my bedroom. I got dressed and went downstairs for breakfast. I left home at 8.40. I walked to school. It took me 5 minutes. The school bell rang at 8.55. I go into school, hang my coat up and go to the classroom. In class we are registered. At 9.05 we go into the hall for assembly, which ended at 9.40. We returned to the classroom and got changed for P.E. After P.E. we did S.R.A. until morning break at 10.40. We had play in the playground until 10.55. We then had Maths Sets until 12.00 when it was time for lunch. I had my lunch in the dining room and then played football in the playground until 13.00. After registration we went to our English Sets until 14.15. we had play until 14.30. In class we drew pictures until end of school at 15.30.
